ya5.2.3:1.1: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhatīti? No.
ya5.2.3:2.1: Yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjatīti? No.
ya5.2.3:3.1: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa maggasaccaṁ nirujjhatīti? No.
ya5.2.3:4.1: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ nirujjhati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjatīti? No.
ya5.2.3:5.1: Yassa samudayasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa maggasaccaṁ nirujjhatīti? No.
ya5.2.3:6.1: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ nirujjhati tassa samudayasaccaṁ uppajjatīti? No.
ya5.2.3:7.1: Yattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati tattha samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhatīti?
ya5.2.3:8.1: Asaññasatte tattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati, no ca tattha samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhati …pe….
ya5.2.3:9.1: (Yatthakaṁ uppādavārepi nirodhavārepi uppādanirodhavārepi sadisaṁ natthi nānākaraṇaṁ.)
ya5.2.3:10.1: Yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhatīti? No.
ya5.2.3:12.1: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati tassa samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhatīti?
ya5.2.3:13.1_0: Taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ na
ya5.2.3:13.1_1: nirujjhati. Sabbesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte taṇhāvippayuttacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe
ya5.2.3:13.1_2: maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati samudayasaccañca na nirujjhati.
ya5.2.3:14.1: Yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:15.1_0: Sabbesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhati,
ya5.2.3:15.1_1: no ca tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati. Sabbesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte taṇhāvippayuttacittassa
ya5.2.3:15.1_2: bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ samudayasaccañca na
ya5.2.3:16.1: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati tassa maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhatīti?
ya5.2.3:17.1_0: Maggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhati.
ya5.2.3:17.1_1: Sabbesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte maggavippayuttacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca
ya5.2.3:17.1_2: phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca na nirujjhati.
ya5.2.3:18.1: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:19.1_0: Sabbesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhati,
ya5.2.3:19.1_1: no ca tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati. Sabbesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte maggavippayuttacittassa
ya5.2.3:19.1_2: bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccañca na nirujjhati
ya5.2.3:20.1: Yassa samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjati tassa maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhatīti?
ya5.2.3:21.1_0: Maggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na
ya5.2.3:21.1_2: nirodhasamāpannānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ samudayasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca na nirujjhati.
ya5.2.3:22.1: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhati tassa samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:23.1_0: Taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ
ya5.2.3:23.1_2: nirodhasamāpannānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ maggasaccañca na nirujjhati samudayasaccañca nuppajjati.
ya5.2.3:26.1: (Yassakampi yassayatthakampi sadisaṁ, yassayatthakepi nirodhasamāpannānanti na kātabbaṁ.)
ya5.2.3:27.1: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjittha tassa samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā.
ya5.2.3:29.1: (Atītā pucchā yathā uppādavāre vibhattā evaṁ uppādanirodhavārepi anulomampi paccanīkampi vibhajitabbaṁ.)
ya5.2.3:30.1: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjissati tassa samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:31.1_0: Aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṁ arahantānaṁ yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:31.1_1: tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissati. Itaresaṁ
ya5.2.3:33.1: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjissati tassa maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:34.1_0: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:34.1_1: tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati. Aggamaggassa
ya5.2.3:34.1_2: uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti ye caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:36.1: Yassa samudayasaccaṁ uppajjissati tassa maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:37.1_0: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ uppajjissati, no ca
ya5.2.3:37.1_1: tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati. Ye maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ samudayasaccañca
ya5.2.3:38.1: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati tassa samudayasaccaṁ uppajjissatīti?
ya5.2.3:39.1_0: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ
ya5.2.3:39.1_1: maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ uppajjissati. Ye maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:41.1: Yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjissati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:42.1_0: Aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṁ arahantānaṁ yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:42.1_1: asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha …pe… itaresaṁ catuvokārānaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha
ya5.2.3:43.1: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjissati tassa samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
ya5.2.3:44.1: Yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjissatīti?
ya5.2.3:45.1_0: Aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṁ arahantānaṁ yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:45.1_1: tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjissati. Pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṁ
ya5.2.3:45.1_2: tesaṁ samudayasaccañca na nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjissati.
ya5.2.3:46.1: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjissati tassa maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
ya5.2.3:47.1: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjissatīti?
ya5.2.3:48.1_0: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:48.1_1: tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjissati. Pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṁ
ya5.2.3:48.1_2: tesaṁ maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjissati.
ya5.2.3:49.1: Yassa samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjissati tassa maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:50.1_0: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ
ya5.2.3:50.1_1: samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati. Aggamaggassa
ya5.2.3:50.1_2: bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ tesaṁ samudayasaccañca nuppajjissati maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:51.1: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjissatīti?
ya5.2.3:52.1_0: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati, no ca
ya5.2.3:52.1_1: tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjissati. Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ tesaṁ maggasaccañca
ya5.2.3:55.1_0: (Yassakampi yassayatthakampi sadisaṁ, samudayasaccaṁ maggasaccaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ, aggamaggassa
ya5.2.3:55.1_1: bhaṅgakkhaṇe, arahantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati
ya5.2.3:56.1: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā.
ya5.2.3:58.1: (Paccuppannaatītā pucchā uppādavārepi uppādanirodhavārepi yassakampi yatthakampi yassayatthakampi anulomampi paccanīkampi sadisaṁ, asammohantena vibhajitabbā.)
ya5.2.3:59.1: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:60.1_0: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā
ya5.2.3:60.1_1: aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati,
ya5.2.3:60.1_2: no ca tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissati. Itaresaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa
ya5.2.3:60.1_3: uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ dukkhasaccañca uppajjati samudayasaccañca nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:61.1: Yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:62.1_0: Sabbesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:62.1_1: tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati. Sabbesaṁ
ya5.2.3:62.1_2: upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ samudayasaccañca nirujjhissati
ya5.2.3:63.1: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:64.1_0: Arahantānaṁ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ
ya5.2.3:64.1_1: upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati, no ca
ya5.2.3:64.1_2: tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati. Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā
ya5.2.3:64.1_3: aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:64.1_4: tesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ dukkhasaccañca uppajjati
ya5.2.3:65.1: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:66.1_0: Yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye
ya5.2.3:66.1_1: caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe
ya5.2.3:66.1_2: maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ
ya5.2.3:66.1_3: dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati. Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ
ya5.2.3:66.1_4: paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ
ya5.2.3:66.1_5: upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccañca nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca uppajjati.
ya5.2.3:67.1: Yassa samudayasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:68.1_0: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ
ya5.2.3:68.1_1: uppajjati, no ca tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati. Ye maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ
ya5.2.3:68.1_2: taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ samudayasaccañca uppajjati maggasaccañca nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:69.1: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati tassa samudayasaccaṁ uppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:70.1_0: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti ye caññe
ya5.2.3:70.1_1: maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne
ya5.2.3:70.1_2: nirodhasamāpannānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ
ya5.2.3:70.1_3: uppajjati. Ye maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccañca
ya5.2.3:72.1: Yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:73.1_0: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā
ya5.2.3:73.1_1: aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ
ya5.2.3:73.1_2: tesaṁ tattha dukkhasaccaṁ …pe… itaresaṁ catuvokāraṁ pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte
ya5.2.3:74.1: Yassa vā pana yattha samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissati tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:75.1_0: Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca
ya5.2.3:75.1_1: phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha
ya5.2.3:75.1_2: dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati. Catuvokāraṁ pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa
ya5.2.3:75.1_3: uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccañca nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca uppajjati.
ya5.2.3:76.1: Yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa tattha maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:77.1_0: Arahantānaṁ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe āpāyikānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:77.1_1: tesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ
ya5.2.3:77.1_2: tattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati, no ca tesaṁ tattha maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati. Aggamaggassa
ya5.2.3:77.1_3: uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:77.1_4: ye caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:77.1_5: tesaṁ tattha dukkhasaccañca uppajjati maggasaccañca nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:78.1: Yassa vā pana yattha maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:79.1_0: Yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye
ya5.2.3:79.1_1: caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe
ya5.2.3:79.1_2: maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati, no ca
ya5.2.3:79.1_3: tesaṁ tattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati. Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā
ya5.2.3:79.1_4: aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:79.1_5: tesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha maggasaccañca nirujjhissati
ya5.2.3:80.1: Yassa yattha samudayasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa tattha maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:81.1_0: Āpāyikānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:81.1_1: tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccaṁ uppajjati, no ca tesaṁ tattha maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:81.1_2: Ye maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccañca
ya5.2.3:82.1: Yassa vā pana yattha maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṁ uppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:83.1_0: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti ye caññe
ya5.2.3:83.1_1: maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne
ya5.2.3:83.1_2: tesaṁ tattha maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccaṁ uppajjati.
ya5.2.3:83.1_3: Ye maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha maggasaccañca nirujjhissati
ya5.2.3:84.1: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati tassa samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:85.1_0: Sabbesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:85.1_1: tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati. Aggamaggassa
ya5.2.3:85.1_2: bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ
ya5.2.3:85.1_3: paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:85.1_4: tesaṁ dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati samudayasaccañca na nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:86.1: Yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:87.1_0: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā
ya5.2.3:87.1_1: aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati,
ya5.2.3:87.1_2: no ca tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati. Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa
ya5.2.3:87.1_3: bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:87.1_4: arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ samudayasaccañca na nirujjhissati
ya5.2.3:88.1: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati tassa maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:89.1_0: Yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye
ya5.2.3:89.1_1: caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe
ya5.2.3:89.1_2: maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ
ya5.2.3:89.1_3: na nirujjhissati. Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye
ya5.2.3:89.1_4: ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:89.1_5: arūpe aggaphalassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:90.1: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:91.1_0: Arahantānaṁ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ
ya5.2.3:91.1_1: upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati,
ya5.2.3:91.1_2: no ca tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati. Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa
ya5.2.3:91.1_3: bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte
ya5.2.3:91.1_4: cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggaphalassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati
ya5.2.3:92.1: Yassa samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjati tassa maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:93.1_0: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti ye caññe
ya5.2.3:93.1_1: maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne
ya5.2.3:93.1_2: nirodhasamāpannānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ
ya5.2.3:93.1_3: na nirujjhissati. Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na
ya5.2.3:93.1_4: paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne tesaṁ samudayasaccañca
ya5.2.3:94.1: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:95.1_0: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ
ya5.2.3:95.1_1: na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjati. Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:95.1_2: arahantānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:95.1_3: taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne tesaṁ maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati samudayasaccañca nuppajjati.
ya5.2.3:97.1: Yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:98.1_0: Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca
ya5.2.3:98.1_1: phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṁ tattha
ya5.2.3:98.1_2: samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati. Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:98.1_3: yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe
ya5.2.3:98.1_4: aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dukkhasaccañca
ya5.2.3:99.1: Yassa vā pana yattha samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:100.1_0: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā
ya5.2.3:100.1_1: aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ
ya5.2.3:100.1_2: tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati.
ya5.2.3:100.1_3: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā
ya5.2.3:100.1_4: aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa
ya5.2.3:100.1_5: ca uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccañca na nirujjhissati
ya5.2.3:101.1: Yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati tassa tattha maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:102.1_0: Yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye
ya5.2.3:102.1_1: caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe
ya5.2.3:102.1_2: maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati, no ca
ya5.2.3:102.1_3: tesaṁ tattha maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati. Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ
ya5.2.3:102.1_4: cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe āpāyikānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ
ya5.2.3:102.1_5: cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggaphalassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattā
ya5.2.3:102.1_6: cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:103.1: Yassa vā pana yattha maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:104.1_0: Arahantānaṁ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe āpāyikānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:104.1_1: tesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ
ya5.2.3:104.1_2: tattha maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati.
ya5.2.3:104.1_3: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe āpāyikānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā
ya5.2.3:104.1_4: maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggaphalassa
ya5.2.3:104.1_5: uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati.
ya5.2.3:105.1: Yassa yattha samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjati tassa tattha maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:106.1_0: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti ye caññe
ya5.2.3:106.1_1: maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne
ya5.2.3:106.1_2: tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṁ tattha maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:106.1_3: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ āpāyikānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:106.1_4: tesaṁ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha
ya5.2.3:107.1: Yassa vā pana yattha maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:108.1_0: Āpāyikānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:108.1_1: tesaṁ tattha maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjati.
ya5.2.3:108.1_2: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ āpāyikānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:108.1_3: tesaṁ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha
ya5.2.3:109.1: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjittha tassa samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:110.1: (Yathā nirodhavāre atītānāgatā pucchā anulomampi paccanīkampi vibhattā evaṁ uppādanirodhavārepi asammohantena vibhajitabbaṁ.)
